New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 26 off 31 balls for India in the match.
Washington Sundar was named the Man of the Match with 51.23 points.
Key Match Events: New Zealand were dismissed for 99/8 in 20 overs.
India achieved the target with 6 wickets with 1 ball remaining.
Notable dismissals included Shubman Gill and Ishan Kishan.
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand elected to bat first after winning the toss.
The manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav expressed pride in the team's performance.
The series is now level 1-1 after this match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow.
